name: Final Slumber
description:
Tiny little PSX style “horror” game for the spookyween month! 

A big focus on how well we could emulate the PSX style and nail the atmosphere instead of making something long or complex, its only like 5 minutes long but I'm proud of the result.

Big shout out to PlayerDeer who did almost all the 3D modelling and texturing!

NOTE: Windows Defender seems to sometimes detect Final Slumber as a false positive. I don't think there's anything I can do about this but please bear with it and don't let that stop you from giving it a go
